alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Independence; Izard; Marion; Searcy; Stone; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 22 at 2:01AM CST until February 22 at 2:45AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Stone County in north central Arkansas... Western Independence County in north central Arkansas... Izard County in north central Arkansas... Eastern Searcy County in north central Arkansas... Southeastern Marion County in north central Arkansas... North central Van Buren County in north central Arkansas... Southeastern Baxter County in north central Arkansas... * Until 245 AM CST. * At 200 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles north of Thola to near Rocky Hill, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mountain View... Melbourne... Horseshoe Bend... Calico Rock... Oxford... Pineville... Franklin... Rocky Hill... Lone Star... Wideman... Gid... Herpel... Lunenburg... Culp... Elberta... Blanchard Springs Campground... Thola... Brandenberg... Croker... Gorby... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Independence; Izard; Marion; Searcy; Stone; Van Buren
